'''Special Jumpy Dumpty Dodoco''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of Special Jumpy Dumpty Dodoco can be obtained from {{Quest|Crisis Relieved! A Happy Memento!}}.
